Welcome to Groggery

Groggery is a fully responsive HTML5 template. It is ideal for restaurants, bars, cafes, bakeries, and coffee shops. Built with Twitter Bootstrap framework, it looks perfect on all major browsers, tablets, and phones.

− Features −

Fully Responsive
Groggery Template looks perfect on all laptops, tablets and phones.
Ionicons Icon Pack
More than 700 scalable premium font icons with everything you need.
Contact Form
Fully functioning PHP contact and reservation forms.
W3C Validation
Clean, developer friendly and W3C Validated HTML code.
Free updates
Buying this template you become eligible to free download all of its future updates.
Support via email
If you have any questions about this template feel free to contact us.
Build with Bootstrap
Groggery template build with most popular Twitter Bootstrap framework and LESS Preprocessor.
Google Maps
Google maps with beautiful style layout integrated in contact section of template.
10 HTML pages
Groggery comes with concise 10 HTML pages with everything you need: blog, menu, events etc.
